  physical_appearance: This is a black graduation gown and collar. The gown has oversized sleeves
 and opens down the front. There is a rectangular label attached to the back of the gown. Beside the gown
 there is a collar with a purple rim. The gown is slightly crumpled and creased.

  sgcool_label_text: This graduation gown belonged to Dr Earl Lu (1925-2005)
 one of Singapore’s most prominent art patrons and philanthropists.  Lu graduated with a Bachelor of Medicine and Surgery degree from the University of Sydney in Australia.  \r\n\r\nThe gown has a label from Australian upmarket department store David Jones. Founded in 1838
 David Jones is currently the oldest departmental store in the world that had been operating under the same name.  \r\n

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black graduation gown and collar. The gown has oversized sleeves, and opens down the front. There is a rectangular label attached to the back of the gown. Beside the gown, there is a collar with a purple rim. The gown is slightly crumpled and creased.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Commencement ceremonies University of Sydney Philanthropists Academic costume
metadata.sgcool_label_text:
This graduation gown belonged to Dr Earl Lu (1925-2005), one of Singapore’s most prominent art patrons and philanthropists.  Lu graduated with a Bachelor of Medicine and Surgery degree from the University of Sydney in Australia.  

The gown has a label from Australian upmarket department store David Jones. Founded in 1838, David Jones is currently the oldest departmental store in the world that had been operating under the same name.
